data.title: Reloaded maps don't spawn any resources
data.body:
Introduced by #4878.

Repro case:
- Start a game on any map.
- Abort mission.
- Start a new game on the same map.

data.title: Replay Viewer play speed Very fast
data.body:
normal replay speed on the improved replay viewer is playing far too fast when on the 'Normal setting'
played a matched against hausemark on doubles and watched the replay back, 
i owned the fastest mammoths that ever existed.
i uploaded the compiled bleed and replay to Phrohdoh who confirmed this issue for me.

Also, Turtle button, fast forward button and pause button have a description appear underneath the game timer when you mouse over. but the Play / normal speed button shows nothing

data.title: Always show primary building label
data.body: Primary building label should always be shown even if it's not manually set by the player.

data.title: [dicussion] Phase Tank
data.body:
Why exactly don't you want the phase tank? The only answer I have ever seen is because its ability to carry 1 passenger cloaked makes it overpowered. We could easily take that out of the equation.

Heres my idea for it:
A late game exploration/recon unit for the allies. You can probably see the terrain already bit you need to update the building. You get one of them, it can sneak past defenses and its missiles are mainly anti-personnel and don't do much to armor.

Build limit: 1.
Health and armor comparable to a V2.
$1500?

Could be good for sneaking up on aircraft that people leave flying around to keep the area revealed. 

How about that?

data.title: Disable crates in default settings for multiplayer
data.body:
In the default settings for multiplayer games, crates should be turned off. This is also compatible with tournament rules.

<bountysource-plugin>

---

data.title: get rid of double slash in path to maps and content in support dir
D2k Random faction
data.body: Is it only me or does someone else have the same problem with random factions? When i try to use random as a faction player 1 always gets harkonnen and player 2 Atreides.

data.title: More beacon polish
data.body: Adds an order button to TD, makes the hotkey consistent with the other order buttons, and restricts placement to the visible map.

data.title: Unify all mods on the C&C order button logic.
data.body: The original ra-derived logic was completely bogus, and had been mostly obsoleted by newer widget improvements.  This unifies the four mods on the C&C logic to remove duplication and improve flexibility.

data.title: RA adding tunguska.oramap
data.body:
Hi. I am interested if 5v5 top vs bottom map would be needed for package? I am abandoning creation of maps for now, but this last one I've made is becouse imo there are not enough top vs bot / left vs right team maps available, so Ive made and tested this one below.

There is lot of trees, but it was an intententioned aim to make it unique for mid-fight... while space between enemies would be not significant, to make war quite effective.

Map was tested in couple games and many improvements has been made. I believe this final version can be closed and included.

I forget to mention, that it can be effectively played even 2v2 with the similar dynamic and map controll.

data.title: [idea] Oh boy, here I go spouting out ideas again.
data.body:
I always thought it might be neat if soviets had a submarine that was a infantry transport.
Pops up when its on a shore tile so it can unload.
On that note I think regular transports should go up onto shore tiles to unload, like in Warcraft. That way units have more cells to exit onto.

Give soviets a flak boat so they can defend against aircraft over water? Give missile subs a secondary anti-air missile?

Give YAK's a single torpedo? Can only be used against things in the water.
(Still the glaring problem of water being near impossible to retake once a player has control of it.)

Would be cool if you could tell helicopters to land anywhere so you can repair them with a mechanic in the field. Understandable that planes can't land anywhere.

Make the got' dang badger buildable already, I tried but the game hates me and just crashes.
-Slow speed
-High cost ($2500?)
-Good damage, easily takes out a adv. power plant, but not a war factory.
-High health (Should be able to penetrate light to moderate anti-air zones and make it back.)
(-Build limit of 2?)
-Bombs should not have parachutes, you can sell buildings in the time it takes them to land.

You could also load it up with infantry while its sitting at the airfield and it will drop them instead! 

I know graphics for tank-traps already exist in the game. They should block vehicles but allow infantry to pass freely. Take a lot of damage but go down easily with engineers. Unless this is how they work already? 

Give engineers "light C4"
-Cant insta-kill buildings 
-Can take out walls, bridges, tank traps.
-All C4's should take out the directly adjacent pieces of wall making using a engineer/Tonya to take out wall a good strategy.

Aircraft should reload slowly in the air, but if they come to a helipad/airfield they reload as they do now which is pretty fast.

New play test when?

data.title: Reduce range of Recon Bikes, Bazookas
data.body:
Guard tower had its range reduced from 6 -> 5. I decreased range of Rockets and BikeRockets to match, to prevent Recon Bikes and E3s from easily outranging them and unbalancing the early game. 

I imagine that without this change, Bike rush will be too good and Nod strategy will mostly focus around it, making for repetitive gameplay.

data.title: Decrease Orca reload time
data.body: Orca was over-nerfed in a previous update. The amount of time needed to reload armament is currently extremely high. Brought it back down to reasonable level.

data.title: Remove incorrect padding from the top of the mod browser list.
Add beacon posters to TD
data.body: ![beacons](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/167819/2470391/8d93f844-b011-11e3-8804-b3d8a2fae339.png)

data.title: Remove duplication between Immobile and Mine.
Chronotank group teleportation (PR remake)
data.body:
- Original Chronotank order generator was cleaned up (still exists).
- Added an order targeter to Chronotank which allows players to hold `Shift` or `Alt` and issue a move order to teleport (multiple tanks selected means group teleportation).
- Updated the Teleport activity to pick the next best destination cell if the target location is invalid (bad terrain type, already occupied, or out of range). This applies to ctnk teleports and the chronosphere return trip only. However there are some limitations of Teleport due to `WorldUtils.MaxRange`.
  - Modders cannot specify a `MaxDistance` greater than 50 for ctnk, however they can remove the limit altogether with `HasDistanceLimit: false`. An exception is thrown if modders try to do this (with a helpful message).
  - When searching for the destination teleport cell, another radius search for valid cells is done. If no appropriate cells are found within radius (before `MaxDistance` or `WorldUtils.MaxRange`, whatever comes first), the unit won't teleport. This is only a problem on the return chronosphere trip, and that would literally require a radius of 50 cells that are invalid from the original chrono destination.

data.title: Dune 2000 Carryall Desync
data.body:
```
Dune 2000 Revision Mod at Version test build 19032014
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 2.0.50727.5477
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Out of sync in frame 4333: Blame Tick.
 Compare syncreport.log with other players.
   bei OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.OutOfSync(Int32 frame, String blame)
   bei OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.CheckSync(Byte[] packet)
   bei OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.<TickImmediate>c__AnonStorey13.<>m__4(Int32 clientId, Byte[] packet)
   bei OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.<Receive>c__AnonStorey1B.<>m__12(Int32 client, Byte[] data)
   bei OpenRA.Network.EchoConnection.Receive(Action`2 packetFn)
   bei OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.Receive(Action`2 packetFn)
   bei OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.TickImmediate()
   bei OpenRA.Sync.<CheckSyncUnchanged>c__AnonStorey35.<>m__6A()
   bei OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[T](World world, Func`1 fn)
   bei OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged(World world, Action fn)
   bei OpenRA.Game.TickInner(OrderManager orderManager)
   bei OpenRA.Game.Tick(OrderManager orderManager)
   bei OpenRA.Game.Run()
   bei OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   bei OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)
```

What happend here? At the moment of the crash i was placing a high tech factory and it was multiplayer vs klaas.

data.title: Sardaukar and Rifleman Shoot animation
data.body: The lenght of the normal and prone shoot animation is wrong. It should be 5 not 6.

data.title: Fix start-game UI acceleration.
data.body: This stops the cursor and other UI animations from running fast, matching what we already do for the world.

data.title: Minibibs for CNC and RA
data.body:
Finished the minibibs now for both RA and CNC.
- only adds minibibs for buildings that never had a bib
- appearance consistent in style to the original bibs
- nothing of the original artwork is changed, its just expands upon it
- tried do follow pizzaoverhead's advice not to change the perceived shape of the buildings and microbit's advice to remove the stones and airfield minibib
- tilesets: RA: temperat, snow, desert, interior; CNC: snow (= winter), temperat, desert
- buildings: RA: chronosphere, iron iurtain, tesla, gun turret, aa gun, sam, pillbox, flame turret, gap gen, ore Silo, service depot; CNC: tech center (MISS), hospital, ore silo, guard tower, advanced guard tower, obelisk, gun turret, service depot

If there is interest, i got a version that has minibibs for all but production buildings/ore refs for testing, too.

![radesert](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1968396/2457538/5c79bfec-af39-11e3-90c1-4db101572d32.PNG)
![ratemp](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1968396/2457540/6365e8f8-af39-11e3-9552-3f9fadcfe547.PNG)
![rasnow](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1968396/2457543/6e50da5c-af39-11e3-9465-52c7d67cc8ed.PNG)

data.title: Panicing E1
data.body: as seen below, should work for cnc as well if the e1 sprite is the same.

data.title: Clean up mobile world insertion.
data.body: Removes some unnecessary duplication and coupling to Mobile.  This should fix #4758, but I wasn't able to reproduce that issue in the first place.

data.title: Allied turret detects camo pillbox without cause.
data.body: I built a camo pillbox and set it to HoldFire then my enemy built a turret a few cells away and the turret immediately began firing on my pillbox. This was discussed on IRC a bit with @cjshmyr and he confirmed it to be a bug.

data.title: Don't show the main menu when returning to the server browser.
data.body: Fixes #4902.

data.title: Remap fixes for RA Engineer and SAM site
data.body:
Adresses #4862 and #4876.

data.title: Calculate the optimum tileset SheetSize dynamically
data.body: All the tiles are the same size, and we know how many of them are needed.  It is easy to calculate the smallest power-of-two sheet that is required, instead of requiring modders to do this manually.
